<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Ringmaster's Introduction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1248) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 73</row>

**Trigger**
An ally's turn begins.

**Requirements**
The ally hasn't acted in the current combat.

</column>

---

You announce the triggering ally with a litany of their legendary achievements, spurring them to action. The target is [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) this turn and can spend the extra action to Stride, Strike, [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53), [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48), or [Perform](/Actions.aspx?ID=59).

<title level="2">Capstone Feats</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 72</row>

Characters who have reached 20th level can choose from the following feats, representing the pinnacle of mortal power influenced by their triumphs.

**Related Feats**: [Annihilating Swing](/Feats.aspx?ID=1240), [Astonishing Explosion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1241), [Banishing Blow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1242), [Denier of Destruction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1243), [Endurance of the Rooted Tree](/Feats.aspx?ID=1244), [Mimic Protections](/Feats.aspx?ID=1245), [Reclaim Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=1246), [Reflecting Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=1247), [Steal Essence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1249), [Tenacious Blood Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1250), [Verdant Presence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1251)
